scripts.build:image-filter-kit: cd ../.. && which yarn && yarn link || : && yarn || npm i && npm run build:all && cd examples/ImageExtraction && which yarn && yarn link react-native-image-filter-kit || :
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:release && which pod && npm run install:pods || :
scripts.generate:android:signing-key: keytool -genkey -v -keystore example.keystore -alias example -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 && mv example.keystore android/app
scripts.generate:android:apk: npm run generate:android:bundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.generate:android:bundle: npm run build:release && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle
scripts.extract:docker:apk: docker create -ti --name image-extraction-container image-extraction.image /bin/bash && docker cp image-extraction-container:/package/examples/ImageExtraction/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk image-extraction.apk && docker rm -fv image-extraction-container
scripts.build:release:docker: npm run build:docker:image && npm run extract:docker:apk
